Package main.farms

Class Farm

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.farms.Farm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimalFarm, MoomooFarm, TomaccoLand, TrumpRanch
    public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Farm. Handles all the animals, crops, items owned by the player, as well as money/bank balance.
    Author:
    Grant and Nick

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Farm​(java.lang.String myFarmType, java.lang.String myFlavour)
      Creates a new farm.
      Farm​(java.lang.String myFarmType, java.lang.String myFlavour, int myBank)
      Creates a new farm, with custom bank balance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Farm

        public Farm​(java.lang.String myFarmType,
            java.lang.String myFlavour)
        Creates a new farm.
        Parameters:
        myFarmType - Type of farm (e.g. Tomacco Land)
        myFlavour - Flavour text

      • Farm

        public Farm​(java.lang.String myFarmType,
            java.lang.String myFlavour,
            int myBank)
        Creates a new farm, with custom bank balance. Used by Trump Ranch.
        Parameters:
        myFarmType - Type of farm (e.g. Tomacco Land)
        myFlavour - Flavour text
        myBank - Bank balance / amount of money to start with

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the user-set name of the farm. This is different to the type of the farm, e.g. "Tomacco Land".
        Returns:
        name of farm

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String myName)
        Sets the name of the farm to myName. Used by SetupGUI.
        Parameters:
        myName - new name of the farm

      • getBankBalance

        public int getBankBalance()
        Returns the bank balance / amount of money in the farm.
        Returns:
        Bank balance

      • getActionsLeft

        public int getActionsLeft()
        Returns number of actions left for the day.
        Returns:
        Number of daily actions left

      • getAnimalBonus

        public float getAnimalBonus()
        Returns the bonus animals get for health and happiness upon purchasing. This will be 0 unless the farm type is an Animal Farm.
        Returns:
        Bonus amount (zero by default)

      • showAnimals

        public java.util.ArrayList<Animal> showAnimals()
        Returns the animals the player has on the farm.
        Returns:
        An array list of animals.

      • showCrops

        public java.util.ArrayList<Crop> showCrops()
        Returns the crops the player has on the farm.
        Returns:
        An array list of crops.

      • showItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> showItems()
        Returns the items the player has on the farm.
        Returns:
        An array list of items.

      • updateBankBalance

        public void updateBankBalance​(int amount)
        Increase the farm's money / bank balance by the specified amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to increase the farm balance by.

      • updateAP

        public void updateAP()
        Decrement number of actions left (action points) by one for the day.

        public java.lang.String getFlavour()
        Returns the flavour text of the farm
        Returns:
        Flavour text of the farm

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the farm type, e.g. "Trump Ranch"
        Returns:
        Type of farm

      • addAnimal

        public void addAnimal​(Animal animal)
        Adds an Animal instance to the farm. Note that the instance itself is added to the farm, not a deep copy of it.
        Parameters:
        animal - Animal to add to the farm

      • addCrop

        public void addCrop​(Crop crop)
        Adds a Crop instance to the farm. Note that the instance itself is added to the farm, not a deep copy of it.
        Parameters:
        crop - Crop to add to the farm

        Adds an Item instance to the farm.
        Parameters:
        item - Item to add to the farm.

        Deletes an Animal instance from the farm.
        Parameters:
        runAway - Animal to delete

        Deletes a Crop instance from the farm.
        Parameters:
        withered - Crop to delete

        public void delItem​(Item used)
        Deletes an Item instance from the farm.
        Parameters:
        used - Item to delete

      • getFarmCap

        public int getFarmCap()
        Returns the farm cap, i.e. the maximum number of crops allowed on the farm.
        Returns:
        Cap on number of crops

        public void addCap​(int amount)
        Increase farm cap by amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to increase farm cap by

        Returns:

      • hasEnoughMoney

        public boolean hasEnoughMoney​(int toDeduct)
        Returns whether deducting an amount would result in bank balance going into debt.
        Parameters:
        toDeduct - Amount to deduct
        Returns:
        whether there will be enough money after deducting

      • hasAnimals

        public boolean hasAnimals()
        Returns whether there are any animals in the farm.
        Returns:
        Number of animals != 0

      • hasFoodItems

        public boolean hasFoodItems()
        Returns whether the farmer has any items that can be used as food for animals, i.e. items whose type is "Animal".
        Returns:
        whether farmer has any animal food.

      • hasCrops

        public boolean hasCrops()
        Returns whether there are any crops in the farm.
        Returns:
        Number of crops != 0

      • hasPlantItems

        public boolean hasPlantItems()
        Returns whether the farmer has any items that can be used on crops, i.e. items whose type is "Crop".
        Returns:
        whether farmer has any items for crops.

      • plantInStock

        public boolean plantInStock​(Crop subject)
        Checks if a particular crop is on the farm.
        Parameters:
        subject - Crop to check
        Returns:
        whether subject is on the farm.

      • itemInHand

        public boolean itemInHand​(Item subject)
        Checks if a particular item is on the farm.
        Parameters:
        subject - Item to check
        Returns:
        whether item is on the farm.

      • refreshAP

        public void refreshAP()
        Refresh AP (daily actions left) to its original number of two. Used at the end of the day.

      • hasSpace

        public boolean hasSpace()
        Returns whether there is enough space on the farm to add another crop. A necessary check before each crop is purchased.
        Returns:
        whether there is enough space on farm.

      • getItemType

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItemType​(java.lang.String type)
        Extracts items of a certain type from the list of items. A type is what kind of asset the item can be used on.
        Parameters:
        type - "Animal" or "Crop".
        Returns:
        a new list containing the items of the given type.

      • getCropType

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCropType()
        Returns a string, which will contain all the kinds of crops the farm currently has in stock, with duplicates removed and in alphabetical order.
        Returns:
        a list of the kinds of crops on the farm.

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Returns the score, calculated using the bank balance and the number of animals and crops.
        Returns:
        the score of the game
